Pre-Game Insights: Rohit-Sharma brigade faces two big challenges: maintaining balance and dealing with England's fast bowlers
Shubman Gill is expected to face a big challenge in his place as Hardik Pandya, while Ashwin might get a chance due to conditions in Lucknow
England's fast bowlers Mark Wood and Chris Woakes could be a challenge for Indian batsmen
Suryakumar Yadav might get another chance to bat at number six
India needs to adapt their playing style to the conditions in Lucknow and take control early in the innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shami might have the task of keeping English batters quiet
England's batting lineup includes big names like Jos Buttler, Jonny Bairstow, Ben Stokes, Liam Livingstone, Harry Brook but none of them has performed well so far
India vs England ODI 2023 will be played at Bharat Ratna Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium, Lucknow at 2 PM IST on 29 October 2023
